name: QK Studio
tagline: We are innovation, liability and commitment.
description:
Hello! We’re QKStudio – an interactive agency based in La Plata, Argentina.
We build apps, websites and exclusive platforms for our brands and clients.
We create because we are passionate, we got talent and the experience to do so.
We’re a professional team with more than 10 years in computing market, provisioning our clients design services and web development.Designers and developers take part of this project in a first class workteam!
